title: Pinocchio, Part 1
subtle: Fairy Tale (fiction), 1,283 words, Level T (Grade 3), Lexile 630L
description: Adapted from the classic fairy tale, Pinocchio, Part 1 introduces students to Geppetto, a poor puppet maker, and Pinocchio, an enchanted but naive puppet. Pinocchio's naivete often gets him into difficult situations. Part 1 will leave students wondering what kind of predicament Pinocchio will find himself in next. The book can also be used to teach students how to analyze characters and to correctly identify and use synonyms.
meta: cajoling, contemplate, delay, frantic, marionette, melodious, misfortune, notion, scorch
Analyze Character : Analyze characters in the story
Question Marks : Recognize and use question marks

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
